name: HurryHurry
overview:
HurryHurry! (www.hurryhurry.com) is a website and mobile app that helps small businesses foster customer loyalty and create new relationships. Without exorbitant fees or profit sharing, HurryHurry! allows small businesses to market themselves to their local communities.

End-users of HurryHurry! connect to local businesses via an interactive map, accessible from a smartphone or the web. Loyalty programs, special events, or sales offered by HurryHurry! businesses in their surrounding area appear on the map in real time; users can check-in to the businesses via Facebook, share information about events with friends, and invite others to attend.

HurryHurry is privately held and headquartered in Charleston, SC.
